name: Anna Girl
description:
This is a casual jigsaw puzzle game, the game contains 28 sexy pictures. In the puzzle at the same time, accompanied by relaxing music, you can unconsciously view the sexy picture content.

1: Jigsaw puzzle. Just click the jigsaw puzzle and move the mouse. Just piece the picture together.
2: No difficulty, each puzzle only 9 pieces. You can finish it in half a minute.
3:28 Achievements. Each level leads to an achievement. Let's unlock it!
4:28 sexy pictures. You can view the full picture every time you pass through.
5: Press the space bar in the game can directly through the level.
